name: Uugo

skills.name: Black Hand
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 35% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns. The chance increases by 5% for each alive enemy.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +5%
Damage Multiplier: 5.2 ATK

skills.name: Maelstrom Wrack (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 50% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns. The chance of placing the [Block Buffs] debuff increases by 5% for each alive enemy.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 6: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 7: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 4.8 ATK

skills.name: Uugo’s Brew (Cooldown: 6 turns)
skills.description:
Removes all [Heal Reduction] debuffs from all allies, then removes 1 random debuff from all allies, then heals all allies by 20% of this Champion’s MAX HP. If all allies are dead, revives them with 50% HP, then fills their Turn Meters by 50% instead.
Level 2: Heal +5%
Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +5%
Level 5: Heal +5%
Level 6: Cooldown -1
Level 7: Cooldown -1

skills.name: Final Spite (Passive, Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description: Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff and a [Block Damage] buff on this Champion for 1 turn whenever this Champion’s last living ally is killed.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 250-300+ ACC, 220+ SPD (speed-tuned), HP 50k+, DEF 2500+. S-rank Epic (Decrease DEF + Block Buffs).
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 250+ ACC, 220+ SPD, HP 50k+, DEF 2500+. Universal debuffer/buffer. Dragon/IG/FK all 10/10.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 300+ ACC (Hard floors resist), 220+ SPD, HP 60k+, DEF 3000+, RES 200+. S-rank utility.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 280+ ACC, 250+ SPD, HP 50k+, RES 250+. Decrease DEF + Block Buffs setup. Speed lead synergy.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 280+ ACC, 220+ SPD, HP 55k+, DEF 2800+. Ogryn Tribes carry (10/10 rating).

recommended_gear: Speed + Accuracy (Universal): SPD, ACC, HP%, DEF%. Core build all content. Speed boots mandatory.
Perception + Speed (High ACC): ACC, SPD, HP%, DEF%. Late-game 300+ ACC (Doom Tower Hard, Arena).
Lifesteal + Speed (Clan Boss): SPD, ACC, HP%, DEF%. Sustain in long fights, speed-tuned 220+.
Immortal + Speed (Faction Wars/DT): HP%, DEF%, SPD, ACC. Passive regen, extreme durability.
Resilience + Speed (Arena): RES, SPD, ACC, HP%. Resist debuffs, tank build 250+ RES.

clan_boss: SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Arcane Celerity, Evil Eye, Master Hexer, Lasting Gifts
DEFENSE: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Retribution
Priority: Master Hexer > Evil Eye > Pinpoint Accuracy > Lasting Gifts. Debuff extension + ACC scaling.
dungeons: SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, Master Hexer, Lasting Gifts
DEFENSE: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death
Priority: Master Hexer > Pinpoint Accuracy > Lasting Gifts. Universal debuffer/buffer.
doom_tower: SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, Master Hexer, Lasting Gifts, Cycle of Magic
DEFENSE: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Retribution
Priority: Master Hexer > Evil Eye > Pinpoint Accuracy. Hard floors ACC scaling critical.
arena: SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, Master Hexer, Lore of Steel
Priority: Pinpoint Accuracy > Evil Eye > Master Hexer. Decrease DEF + Block Buffs setup.
faction_wars: SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, Master Hexer, Lasting Gifts
DEFENSE: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Delay Death, Retribution
Priority: Master Hexer > Pinpoint Accuracy > Lasting Gifts. Ogryn Tribes carry.
general: Support tree masteries (Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, Master Hexer, Lasting Gifts)
Master Hexer T6 for debuff extension (Decrease DEF/ATK, Leech, Block Buffs)
Evil Eye for ACC scaling (critical for 300+ ACC builds)
Lasting Gifts for buff extension (Increase DEF/SPD, Shield)

blessings: Cruelty (PRIMARY - All Content): Debuffer role, extends Decrease DEF/ATK/Block Buffs duration.
Brimstone (Doom Tower/Dungeons): HP Burn synergy on debuff application, extra damage.
Survival Instinct (Arena/Faction Wars): Survive burst, second-chance utility support.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI behavior excellent. Prioritizes A3 (Decrease DEF/ATK + Block Buffs) > A2 (buff spread) > A1. Perfect for auto-play all content.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Block Buffs lockdown, Decrease DEF enabler
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: A3 Block Buffs prevents enemy buff strategies (Clan Boss stun block, Arena Increase ATK/DEF). Decrease DEF 60% enables nuker teams (Seer, Cold heart, Royal Guard). Cleanse + buff spread (A2) = team-wide Increase DEF/SPD sustain. Universal cheese enabler for multiple strategies.

mechanics_advisory: LEGENDARY IN DISGUISE - S-rank Epic. Universal support debuffer/buffer ALL CONTENT. Ayumilove 5/5 stars across the board (rare perfect rating). A3: Decrease DEF 60% + Decrease ATK 50% + Block Buffs 2 turns (3-turn CD booked) = core debuffer. A2: Cleanse all debuffs + buff spread (Increase DEF/SPD/Shield) = team sustain. A1: Leech scales with enemy count (35% + 5% per alive enemy = up to 55% Leech chance). Community consensus: 'Best Epic support', 'Better than many Legendaries'. MUST BOOK: A3 cooldown 4→3 (100% uptime Decrease DEF), A2 cooldown 5→4 (buff uptime). Patch 4.50 buff (May 2021): A3 cooldown reduced, transformed from good to god-tier. Build priority: ACC 250-300+, SPD 220+, HP%/DEF% survivability. Pairs with: Nukers (Seer, Coldheart, Royal Guard), Speed leads (Arbiter, Lyssandra), Unkillable teams (Block Buffs disables CB stun). Weakness: Magic affinity (weak vs Force content). Use case: CB (Block Buffs stun immunity), Dungeons (universal), Doom Tower Hard (ACC scaling debuffer), Arena (Decrease DEF setup), Faction Wars (Ogryn Tribes carry). If you own Uugo, build immediately - top priority Epic.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats validated from user screenshot (HP 19650, ATK 738, DEF 1255, SPD 102, C.RATE 15, C.DMG 50, RES 30, ACC 15). 100% confidence. Ayumilove 5/5 stars S-rank Epic all content.
